mdRecord.dcterms:description: Nearly all glass, the "Martin V" soothes allergies to heavy architecture. A 500-seat restaurant, open to all, works on the self-service formula. Seminar rooms have been furnished and student community areas are in the basement.http://www.md.ucl.ac.be/celil/martinv.html [work]
